entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
